info.description:
Conformance requirements for NHS Digital EPS Futures

 | API Documentation |
 |-----|
  |[Electronic Prescription Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/electronic-prescription-service-fhir)|


 | FHIR Implementation Guide | Version |
 |-----|-----|
 |[uk.nhsdigital.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)||
 |[uk.nhsdigital.medicines.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/nhsdigital-medicines/home)||
 |[UKCore.Release1.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)|1.2.2-prerelease|

tags.name: MedicationRequest
tags.description:
Profile : [NHSDigital-MedicationRequest-Contained](https://simplifier.net/guide/nhsdigital/home) (additional rules to the resource) 
 Resource type: [MedicationRequest](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/MedicationRequest.html) (also contains links to code generations schemas)

tags.name: MedicationDispense
tags.description:
Profile : [NHSDigital-MedicationDispense](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital-Medicines/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-MedicationDispense.guide.md) (additional rules to the resource) 
 Resource type: [MedicationDispense](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/MedicationDispense.html) (also contains links to code generations schemas)

get.summary: server-capabilities: Fetch the server FHIR CapabilityStatement

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description:
Returns prescriptions for a specific patient [MedicationRequest](medicationrequest.html): Returns prescriptions for a specific patient
| Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)| MedicationRequest.subject.where(resolve() is Patient) |

parameters.name: intended-performer
parameters.description:
Return prescriptions for this medication reference Returns the intended performer of the administration of the medication request

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|  MedicationRequest.performer |

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Status of the prescription [MedicationRequest](medicationrequest.html): Status of the prescription
| Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)| MedicationRequest.status |

parameters.name: requester
parameters.description:
Returns prescriptions prescribed by this prescriber Returns prescriptions prescribed by this prescriber

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|  MedicationRequest.requester |

parameters.name: group
parameters.description:
Returns grouped prescriptions

 Caution: This does not appear to be a valid search parameter. **Please check HL7 FHIR conformance.**

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An [OAuth 2.0 bearer token](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation#user-restricted-apis).

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: NHSD-Session-URID
parameters.description: The user role ID (URID) for the current session. Also known as a user role profile ID (URPID).

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A globally unique identifier (GUID) for the request, which we use to de-duplicate repeated requests and to trace the request if you contact our helpdesk

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: An optional ID which you can use to track transactions across multiple systems. It can have any value, but we recommend avoiding `.` characters.

post.summary: create-type: Create a new MedicationRequest instance.
post.description:
See also [FHIR create](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/http.html#create)

**Create a new prescription**. Equivalent to `prescription-order` message in NextGen

Replaces part of the functionality in cancel prescription

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description:
The identity of a patient to list dispenses for [MedicationDispense](medicationdispense.html): The identity of a patient to list dispenses for
| Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)| MedicationDispense.subject.where(resolve() is Patient) |

parameters.name: prescription
parameters.description:
The identity of a prescription to list dispenses from  [MedicationDispense](medicationdispense.html): The identity of a prescription to list dispenses from

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|  MedicationDispense.authorizingPrescription |

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Returns dispenses with a specified dispense status [MedicationDispense](medicationdispense.html): Returns dispenses with a specified dispense status
| Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)| MedicationDispense.status |
